body: So Chigusa and her adopted family has been vampires for many years but Chigusa has never been in love until she met Yuuto which makes him as Chigusa's first love and only man that she gave her virginity to but since she's a vampire they can't be together thus they planned to make him one of them but since it's too early for him to join the pack so they brought him back home and they disappeared until the day they get reunited? so if Yuuto became part of their pack, it would be Genya, Shirou and Kirika as threesome lovers then Yuuto and Chigusa as lovers. Needs a 2nd chapter. Bonus note: Do you peeps find it odd that vampires can cure wounds and remove scars but never a "broken hymen/deflowered pussy/penetrated vagina"? call it whatever you want.
yeah, the continuation of Fukurou no Yakata!
